overview:
Robert is a creative and managing director in Monogram Interactive. He has over 10 years of experience in online and multimedia industry. He transforms his experience to the inovative solutions for clients. He creates connections between inovative technologies and creative solutions for clients. Recently he is focused with his team on delivering content publication platform for the iPad and Android. New interactive technologies together with arrival of touchscreen devices are opening new challeges for advertising, education and publishing for your content.

Specialties interactive multimedia, digital publishing content creation, user experience design development, brand and identity, team leader
